configure.id: 欢迎来到诺亚方舟！指挥官！
configure.value: Welcome to Noah's Ark! Commander!

configure.id: 这里是唯一一个躲过超级武器攻击的的基地。
configure.value: Here is the only base that avoid the attack of the Super Weapon.

configure.id: 不好！敌人进攻了！全面戒备！！
configure.value: Gosh! Enemy Attack! Highest Alert!

configure.id: 守住！！天啊！基洛夫空艇！！击毁他们！别让他们靠近。
configure.value: Hold on!! Oh my god! Kirov Airship!! Destroy them! Let non get close.

configure.id: 指挥官，诺亚方舟已经被超级武器锁定了！很遗憾，我们没能保住了！
configure.value: Commander, the Noah's Ark has been targeted by the Super Weapon. Sorry, we can not protect it!

configure.id: 指挥官，诺亚方舟所有数据都已清除，现在我们要转移到新的栖息地。在那我们能重新开始。
configure.value: Commander, all data of Noah's Ark have been cleared, now we need a new base. Let's start all over there.

configure.id: 启动核武装置!让我们造个“死亡绿洲”。
configure.value: Start the nuclear weapon unit! Let make a oasis of death.

configure.id: 有意思...居然能从我的超级武器底下逃脱了。以后再找机会慢慢陪你们玩吧。
configure.value: Interesting....Escaped from my Super Weapon. See you another time.

configure.id: 军事基地不能没有强大的防御设施。长官可以为我们的军事基地先建造一座狙击塔，狙击塔是性价比最高的防御塔。
configure.value: A military base should have strong defense facilities. We can build a Sniper Tower first. It's efficient and of low cost.

configure.id: 狙击塔可以在短期内预防敌人的进攻。
configure.value: A Sniper Tower can stop enemy attack in a short term.

configure.id: 长官，请建造一座发电厂。如果缺乏电力，基地里的很多建筑将运行不了，一旦电力严重不足，遇到敌人进攻时，战斗力会受到严重影响。
configure.value: Commander, please build a power station. We need power to support other buildings. The shortage of power could be disastrous when under attack.

configure.id: 石油是战争重要的资源之一，随着战争的推进，我们将会从很多渠道获得大量的石油资源，请长官先建造一座储油罐，随时准备接收战利品。
configure.value: Mineral oil is important resource. We are going to obtain more as war trophies during the war. Please build up a oil tank for trophies.

configure.id: 基地可以建造一座科技钻油井，是获得石油的一个基础保障。
configure.value: You can also build a Oil Derrick to obtain Oil.

configure.id: 长官，我们面对的敌人将会越来越强，当务之急，是要在战车工厂为我们的作战单位提升兵种等级，这样我们才有能力面对后续更残酷的战斗。
configure.value: Commander, we are going to face tougher battles. Please upgrade battle units in the War Factory.

configure.id: 战车工厂的工作效率很高，我们的作战部队已经迫不及待的要去和敌人战斗一场了。
configure.value: The War Factory is efficient, our armies are ready for fight.

configure.id: 储油罐储存力已略显不足，请尽快提升储油罐等级。
configure.value: Oil tank is almost full, please upgrade for more storage.

configure.id: 金库储存力也需要随之跟上基地的发展了。
configure.value: The Treasury also need more room.

configure.id: 长官，灰熊坦克已经解锁，现在可以派遣灰熊坦克出征为您作战。灰熊坦克属于综合型兵种，性价比高，克制巨炮防御塔，同时适合与多种兵种单位配合，比如步兵战车、火箭车、光棱塔。
configure.value: Commander, the Bear Tank has been unlocked, now you can send Bear Tank to battle. The Bear Tank, good quality at a reasonable price. Predator of Grand Cannon, cooperate with armies like IFV, Rocket Sled, and Prism Tower.

configure.id: 长官，我们的作战部队已经迫不及待的要去和敌人战斗一场了。
configure.value: Commander, our armies can't wait for a battle.

configure.id: 机枪塔已经准备就绪，随时可以建造。
configure.value: A Machine Gun Tower is ready, we can build any time.

configure.id: 机枪塔适合攻击集群型作战单位，且生命高，适合在基地前方负责防御。
configure.value: Machine Gun Tower restrains enemy crowds. It's firm with high HP.

configure.id: 尤里的力量依然很强大，强大到我们只能一步一步夺回自己的领地
configure.value: The power of Yuri is still strong, we can only take our land back inch by inch.

configure.id: 超时空传送仪是爱因斯坦的杰作！我们马上就能拥有它了！
configure.value: The Chronosphere is the masterpiece of Einstein! We are having is soon!

configure.id: 我们可以使用超时空传送仪，召唤更多的指挥官为我们作战。
configure.value: We can summon more commanders with the Chronosphere.

configure.id: 鲍里斯已经进入到您的麾下，请充分支配指挥官们，不久你就会发现他们能给您带来惊喜。
configure.value: Boris is at your service. Please dispatch them to the right position. Soon they will bring you surprise.

configure.id: 长官，间谍卫星已经准备就绪，可以建造。
configure.value: Commander, the spy satellite is ready to build.

configure.id: 有一个未知区域正在等待我们去探索。
configure.value: An undetected location is waiting for us.

configure.id: 步兵战车升级
configure.value: IFV Upgrade

configure.id: 升级储油罐
configure.value: Upgrade Oil Tank

configure.id: 升级金库
configure.value: Upgrade Treasury

configure.id: 升级战车工厂
configure.value: Upgrade War Factory

configure.id: 解锁灰熊坦克
configure.value: Bear Tank unlocked

configure.id: 开启引导图
configure.value: Open Directory

configure.id: 招募指挥官
configure.value: Recruit Commander

configure.id: 通关1-1
configure.value: Pass 1-1

configure.id: 通关1-2
configure.value: Pass 1-2

configure.id: 通关1-3
configure.value: Pass 1-3

configure.id: 通关1-4
configure.value: Pass 1-4

configure.id: 通关1-5
configure.value: Pass 1-5

configure.id: 通关1-6
configure.value: Pass 1-6

configure.id: 通关1-7
configure.value: Pass 1-7

configure.id: 通关1-8
configure.value: Pass 1-8

configure.id: 通关1-9
configure.value: Pass 1-9

configure.id: 长官，可以造新建筑了
configure.value: Commander, you have new building.

configure.id: 长官，[code]已建造完成
configure.value: Commander, [code] unit ready.

configure.id: 长官，[code]已经升级了
configure.value: Commander, [code] upgrade

configure.id: 长官，您需要补充作战单位！
configure.value: Commander, you need to recruit battle units!

configure.id: 部队报到！
configure.value: Troop ready!

configure.id: 我们会把他们送上西天。
configure.value: I'll send them to hell.

configure.id: 审判之日到了
configure.value: Judgement Day is coming

configure.id: 焦土政策！
configure.value: Adust policy!

configure.id: 我喜欢这个工作！
configure.value: I love this job!

configure.id: 开始电疗法。
configure.value: Start electrotherapy.

configure.id: 今天会死很多人！
configure.value: A lot will be dead today!

configure.id: 长官，我们现在是1星精英作战部队！
configure.value: Commander, now we are 1-Star Elite troop!

configure.id: 长官，我们现在是2星精英作战部队！
configure.value: Commander, now we are 2-Star Elite troop!

configure.id: 准备好破坏了！
configure.value: Ready for destruction!

configure.id: HAHAHAHH……哈哈哈……
configure.value: HAHAHAHH……HAHAHAHH……

configure.id: 我状态很好！
configure.value: I'm in good condition!

configure.id: 收获不错！找到了一些金币！
configure.value: Fine harvest! Find some gold!

configure.id: 现在出门不捡到钱就觉得是吃亏了！
configure.value: I would feel suffering a loss if I can not pick money on the road!

configure.id: 嘿，长官，能把这些金币给我一些吗？
configure.value: Ha, Commander, can I have some of the gold?

configure.id: 长官，发现石油！
configure.value: Commander! mineral oil detected!

configure.id: 油价该降降了！
configure.value: Time to drop gasoline price!

configure.id: 长官，您可以多造几辆天启了！
configure.value: Commander, you can have more Apocalypses!

configure.id: 天启在此！
configure.value: Apocalypse ready!

configure.id: 搞定他们！
configure.value: Crash them!

configure.id: 我跑得好快!
configure.value: I'm running too fast!

configure.id: 遭到突袭！遭到突袭！
configure.value: Enemy attack! Enemy attack!

configure.id: 该死的陷阱！
configure.value: Damn the trap!

configure.id: 长官，给他们来一发原子弹吧！
configure.value: Commander, give them a atom bomb!

configure.id: 核弹准备就绪
configure.value: Nuclear bomb ready!

configure.id: 我需要支援！
configure.value: We need assistance!

configure.id: 拿下他们！
configure.value: Defeat them!

configure.id: 闪电风暴已经生成！
configure.value: Lightning Storm ready!

configure.id: 基洛夫报道！
configure.value: Kirov ready!

configure.id: 援军准备好了!
configure.value: Relief troops ready!

configure.id: 核弹准备就绪!
configure.value: Nuclear bomb ready!

configure.id: 请选择目标!
configure.value: Please select target!

configure.id: 丽尼亚
尤里
鲍里斯
指挥官，目标的位置已确认，可以发起进攻！
configure.value: Commander, target locked, ready for attack!

configure.id: 指挥官，远程导弹准备就绪。
configure.value: Commander, long-range missile ready!

configure.id: 指挥官，基洛夫空艇已经就位。
configure.value: Commander, Kirov Airship ready!

configure.id: 指挥官，核武器已经准备完毕。
configure.value: Commander, nuclear weapon ready!

configure.id: 指挥官阁下，我们摧毁了敌人的司令部，已经胜利了，可以撤军了
configure.value: Commander, we destroyed the Headquarters of enemy, we can leave now!

configure.id: 指挥官阁下，敌人的发电厂虽然可以抵消掉一部分伤害，但是还是挡不住我们强大的火力
configure.value: Commander, though the power station of enemy counteracted part of the damage, but finally turned out useless under our attack.

configure.id: 指挥官阁下，我们这次战斗收获颇丰，击毁了敌人的储油罐，获得了大量的石油资源
configure.value: Commander, we got good harvest from this battle, we obtained the oil tank of enemy!

configure.id: 指挥官阁下，在战场中，我们总是会有一些额外的支援，但是要小心陷阱
configure.value: Commander, we can always have extra support in the battle, but we should be careful of traps.

configure.id: 因为我们有了强大的指挥官，胜利总是属于我们
configure.value: Because we have great commanders, victory is always ours.

configure.id: 指挥官阁下，我们获得了敌人的科技成果超时空传送仪，能从其他位面获得带领我们士兵战斗的将军
configure.value: Commander, we obtained Chronosphere tech from enemy, it can summon commanders from other potential surfaces

configure.id: 发电厂已摧毁，我们的火力能够造成更多的伤害
configure.value: Their power station is destroyed, we can cause more damage.

configure.id: 指挥官，这座基地以后就是你的家了，快在敌军进攻之前好好建造吧！
configure.value: Commander, this would be your home base from now on. Build it up before enemy comes.

configure.id: 指挥官，请先按引导建造一座狙击塔。
configure.value: Commander, please follow the direction and build up a Sniper Tower .

configure.id: 现在狙击塔已经建造好了，在短期内应该不用担心敌人突袭。
configure.value: Now the Sniper Tower is ready, no need to worry about enemy for a while.

configure.id: 指挥官，敌人随时都有可能会继续进攻，我们需要加快步伐发展基地。
configure.value: Commander, enemies may come at anytime, we need develop faster.

configure.id: 指挥官，金币可以为您训练作战部队，还可以通过花费金币提升部队的战斗力。
configure.value: Commander, gold can be used for troop training. You can also enhance your troop by gold.

configure.id: 后面我们还会获得更多的金币，所以现在我们需要一个金库用来存放金币。
configure.value: We are going to have more gold, so now, we need a Treasury for gold storage.

configure.id: 今后建筑的建造升级需要消耗大量的石油，我们需要先建造一座科技钻油井。
configure.value: We need a lot for petroleum for later development, now we need to build a Oil Derrick.

configure.id: 储油罐是储存石油的地方。如果储油罐存储空间不足，我们每次战斗获得的石油就没有办法带回家了。
configure.value: Oil tank is for oil storage. If oil tank full, then we can not take back the oil obtained from battles.

configure.id: 指挥官，请在集结点训练一支出战部队。司令部等级越高，可以出战的战斗部队会越多呦。
configure.value: Please train a troop at the Rally Point. You can send out more troops with higher level headquarters.

configure.id: 我们的基地附近发现了敌人，现在就驱逐他们吧。
configure.value: Enemies detected near our base, wipe them out.

configure.id: 摧毁敌方的主基地就可以直接获得胜利了！
configure.value: Destroy the main base of enemy to get victory directly!

configure.id: 干的漂亮！现在这个据点是我们的了
configure.value: Nice job! Now this spot is ours.

configure.id: 从现在开始，据点会为我们提供金币资源。一定要小心，别被敌人再次入侵。
configure.value: From now on, the spot will provide us with gold. Be careful, watch out enemies.

configure.id: 指挥官，总部为您准备了一批备用的技能卡，您可以先熟悉一下如何使用。
configure.value: Commander, headquarters prepared a batch of skill cards, you can check how to use them first.

configure.id: 只要战斗开始，技能卡可以随时释放，一会儿将技能卡拖拽到战场就可以将技能释放出来了。
configure.value: You can use the skill cards anytime after the battle start, pull the card to the battle will cast the skill.

configure.id: 如何，在技能的辅助下，是不是感觉敌人很不堪一击？
configure.value: How? With the help of skills, enemies seems too weak?

configure.id: 指挥官，先回主基地重新整备再继续出击吧。
configure.value: Commander, Let's get back to our home base for a rest.

configure.id: 指挥官，看来有敌人趁我们不注意，偷袭了主基地，好在损失并不大。
configure.value: Commander, enemies gave us asneak attack when we were out, luckily the loss is not too much.

configure.id: 指挥官，现在的资源很充足，可以升级司令部了。
configure.value: Commander, now we have enough resources to upgrade the Headquarters.

configure.id: 飞机场是提高战斗力的重要场所，配置飞机可以在战场为您提供空中支援
configure.value: Airfield can greatly enhance your strength. Aircraft provide you with air support in a battle.

configure.id: 战术研究院已经建造好了，看我们能拿到什么样的技能卡
configure.value: Tactics Academy is ready, see what skill cards can we get.

configure.id: 选择看看，我们应该带什么样的技能出战。
configure.value: Please choose the cards we need in the battle.

configure.id: 指挥官，充分利用战斗单位和技能，好好部属他们。
configure.value: Please make good use of battle units and skill cards.

configure.id: 有一个强大的敌人正在靠近我们。我们一定要守护好主基地的周全。
configure.value: A strong enemy is getting close. We must protect our main base.

configure.id: 战车工厂是提升坦克部队战斗能力的场所，在这里可以把坦克打造更厉害。
configure.value: You can upgrade your tanks in the War Factory.

configure.id: 我们现在就进入战车工厂，提升坦克的战斗能力吧。
configure.value: Get into the War Factory and upgrade your tanks.

configure.id: 指挥官，现在一切应该都在您的掌握之中了，如果不确定后续该如何进行，可以进入【任务】查看当前可以做些什么。
configure.value: Commander, now you have know everything here, if you do not know what to do next, please check the Quest list.

configure.id: 请继续升级，增强您的实力，前方总会有新的挑战。请谨记，一定不能让敌人不断的占领更多的据点。
configure.value: Please upgrade to enhance strength, there is always new challenges. Do remember, do not let enemies occupy more spots.

configure.id: 指挥官，发电厂可以为电磁塔攻击提供能源，也可以为一定范围内的建筑物提供防护。
configure.value: Commander, power station provides energy to Mag-Tower and also provides armor to buildings within range.

configure.id: 指挥官，现在我们可以继续教训尤里或者攻打据点积攒资源。
configure.value: Commander, now we can continue give lessons to Yuri or occupy spots for resources.

configure.id: 指挥官，现在让我们去找个家伙试试我们的技能吧。
configure.value: Commander, let us find some buy to try our skills.

configure.id: 指挥官，战斗机已经待命，随时可以加入战斗。
configure.value: Commander, the fighter aircraft is ready for fight.

configure.id: 指挥官，我只能帮助您到这了，相信以后您知道要怎么做，基地建设很重要，没有事情做的时候可以去作战图和PVP看看。
configure.value: Commander, here is all I can help, now you know everything about here. Base construction is important. Please check the Map or PVP function when you feel nothing else to do.

configure.id: 指挥官，我已经恭候多时了，欢迎回来！
configure.value: I've been waiting long for you! Welcome back! Commander!

configure.id: 从今天起，这个基地就属于你了！
configure.value: From today, this base is all at your service!

configure.id: 指挥官，请建造一座狙击塔， 断了敌人想偷袭的美梦吧！
configure.value: Commander, please build a Sniper Tower, enemies may come anytime.

configure.id: 发电厂不仅可以为电磁塔的攻击提供能源，还可以为一定范围内的建筑提供防护。
configure.value: Power station provides energy to Mag-Tower and also provides armor to buildings within range.

configure.id: 心灵力量准备完毕，你准备好接受狂风暴雨吧！
configure.value: Mental Power is ready. I'll try it on you.

configure.id: 尤里先生，我已经收到您的旨意。
configure.value: Mr. Yuri, I have taken your order.

configure.id: 指挥官，让我们加速基地建设，更好的防御别人的进攻。
configure.value: Commander, let's speed up our construction to enhance our defence！

configure.id: 指挥官，我们刚刚被尤里控制的部队袭击，在此之前，我们还是战友。
configure.value: Commander, we were attacked by the troop controlled by Yuri. We were friends moments ago.

configure.id: 尤里拥有强大的心灵控制力量，能驱使同胞成为我们的敌人，所以一定要多加小心。
configure.value: Yuri has the power of mind control and makes of friends become enemies. Be careful!

configure.id: 指挥官，基地被损坏的太严重了，让我们开始重建它吧！
configure.value: Commander, the base was badly destroy. We need reconstruction.

configure.id: 指挥官，间谍卫星可以随时掌握作战图的动态。
configure.value: Commander, the spy satellite can update the battle info for you anytime.

configure.id: 指挥官，没有精英的部队将无法面对强大的敌人，超时空传送仪可以为我们招募到有丰富战斗经验的特种兵，让我们建造试试吧！
configure.value: Commander, a troop without Elite can not fight against strong enemies. The Chronosphere can recruit experienced special troops for us. Please build a Chronosphere.

configure.id: 特种兵鲍里斯已经准备好，随时待命，让我们现在就进入超时空传送仪，并让特种兵鲍里斯上阵战斗吧。
configure.value: Specops Boris is ready. Now enter the Chronosphere and arrange the Boris into troop.

configure.id: 指挥官，能够加入您的队伍我很荣幸！
configure.value: It's my honor to join your army!

configure.id: 指挥官，我们的基地附近发现了敌人，现在就去消灭他们吧！
configure.value: Enemies detected near our base, let's wipe them out.

configure.id: 敌人已被击退，据点已被我们成功拿下，被占领的据点会向基地输送资源，到时候别忘了领取呦！
configure.value: Enemies are defeated, now we have taken the spot. the spot will send resources to our base, do not forget to collect.

configure.id: 矿石精炼厂已经产出了一部份金币，可以做为您的启动资金。
configure.value: Commander, we got some oil resource from the battle just now, it can be used on our base construction.

configure.id: 矿石精炼厂已经为我们提炼出金币了。
configure.value: Mineral Refinery extracted some gold for us.

configure.id: 这次的战斗是不是比之前爽快多啦？继续战斗吧！
configure.value: Is this battle more clear-cut than before?

configure.id: 现在就来试试核弹的威力吧
configure.value: Now try the power of the nuclear bomb

configure.id: 对手的基地弱爆了，可以去拿它练手啦，试试自己有多厉害吧！
configure.value: There is not much defense facilities in enemy base, you can try it there.

configure.id: 指挥官，司令部可以升级了。
configure.value: Commander, you can upgrade the Headquarters.

configure.id: 指挥官，司令部每升一级会开放更多的建筑，所以说司令部的等级决定了基地发展的程度。
configure.value: Commander, higher Headquarters level can help unlock more buildings.

configure.id: 指挥官，战车工厂已经准备好了，随时可以建造。
configure.value: War Factory is ready for construction.

configure.id: 司令部升到2级为我们开放了一个新的集结点，让我们现在就去看看吧。
configure.value: Headquarters upgrade to level 2, now we have a new Rally Point, let's go and check.

configure.id: 指挥官，现在让我们使用飞机来配合战斗吧！
configure.value: Commander, let's bring Aircraft to the battle.

configure.id: 现在就来试试强化之后的多功能步兵战车的实力吧！
configure.value: Now try the enhanced IFV.

configure.id: 战术研究院已经准备好，随时可以建造。
configure.value: Tactics Academy is ready for construction.

configure.id: 指挥官，雷达探测到在我们的基地附近有一个尤里的据点群。摧毁它也许能缓解心灵控制器的影响范围。
configure.value: Commander, radar shows there were spots group of Yuri near our base. Destroy it! May be we can weaken the effect range of the mind controller.

configure.id: 指挥官，让我们集结部队，踏上征途，去消灭敌人吧！
configure.value: Commander, let's gather our armies and wipe out enemies!

configure.id: 当建筑上有资源图标时，点击资源建筑可以收取资源
configure.value: When there is icon of resources on buildings, click to collect.

configure.id: 点击打开建造列表
configure.value: Click to open build list

configure.id: 点击建造金库，并进入建造模式
configure.value: Click to build Treasury and enter construction mode.

configure.id: 点击开始建造
configure.value: Click to build.

configure.id: 点击正在建造的建筑物
configure.value: Click the under construction building

configure.id: 点击立即结束按钮，可以快速完成建造
configure.value: Click the Finish button to complete the construction.

configure.id: 立即完成建造，五分钟以下免费
configure.value: Complete the building right now, free when only 5 minutes left

configure.id: 点击对应的集结点，可以进入配兵界面
configure.value: Click the corresponding Rally Point to dispatch troops.

configure.id: 点击进入作战图，攻打敌人
configure.value: Enter the Map to attack enemies.

configure.id: 点击敌人的据点，打击敌人
configure.value: Click enemy spot to attack enemies

configure.id: 点击侦察按钮，进入敌人基地
configure.value: Click the Scout button to enter enemy base.

configure.id: 点击开始攻打敌人的基地
configure.value: Click start to attack enemy base.

configure.id: 确认自己所带的部队，点击开始战斗
configure.value: Confirm your troop formation, click Start to start battle

configure.id: 优先摧毁敌人的防御塔，可以减少自己的部队损失
configure.value: Destroy enemy tower first to lessen your troop loss.

configure.id: 摧毁敌人的司令部，立即获得战斗胜利
configure.value: Destroy enemy Headquarters to win immediately.

configure.id: 点击返回主基地
configure.value: Click to enter home base

configure.id: 点击司令部
configure.value: Click the Headquarters

configure.id: 点击升级按钮，进入建筑物升级界面
configure.value: Click the Upgrade button to enter building upgrade interface.

configure.id: 点击按钮，立即进入建筑物升级
configure.value: Click button to start building upgrade

configure.id: 点击升级按钮，可以提高对应兵种的战斗力
configure.value: Click Upgrade button to enhance units

configure.id: 升级雷达，可以在作战图中可以在作战图中开启更多的据点
configure.value: Upgrade Radar can unlock more spot on the map.

configure.id: 点击进入战术研究院
configure.value: Click to enter Tactics Academy

configure.id: 点击抽取技能卡，技能卡可以在战场中释放
configure.value: Click to draw skill card, skill card can be used in battles.

configure.id: 只有装备的技能卡，才可以在战场中释放
configure.value: Only equipped skill card can be used in battle

configure.id: 点击进入技能卡释放模式
configure.value: Click to enter skill card casting mode

configure.id: 点击进入飞机场，建造飞机
configure.value: Click to enter Airfield, manufacture an Aircraft

configure.id: 点击进入飞机释放模式
configure.value: Click to enter Aircraft casting mode

configure.id: 雷达升级完成，我们可以探索到更多的敌人了
configure.value: Radar upgrade finished, now we can detect more enemies.

configure.id: 点击建造油库，并进入建造模式
configure.value: Click to build oil tank and enter construction mode

configure.id: 拖放特种兵进入战场
configure.value: Pull the special troop to army

configure.id: 拖动技能卡至要释放的位置
configure.value: Pull skill card to your target

configure.id: 拖动飞机至要释放位置
configure.value: Pull Aircraft to your target

configure.id: 拖放部队进入战场
configure.value: Pull troop into the army

configure.id: 点击PVP按钮会匹配到和您实力相当的玩家，获得胜利可以获得资源和奖杯
configure.value: Click PVP button to compete with other players of close strength, rewards for winner are resources and trophies

configure.id: 拖动对应的兵种，完成配置
configure.value: Pull the corresponding troop to complete the dispatch

configure.id: 系统已经为您匹配到了一个对手，如果您确定要开始战斗，我们会从您的金库扣除
configure.value: System find a match for you, if you decide to start battle, gold will be cut from your Treasury

configure.id: 点击建造科技钻油井，并进入建造模式
configure.value: Click to build Oil Derrick and enter construction mode

configure.id: 点击进入防御建筑列表
configure.value: Click to enter Defence Building list

configure.id: 点击建造狙击塔，并进入建造模式
configure.value: Click to build Sniper Tower and enter construction mode

configure.id: 点击进入支持建筑列表
configure.value: Click to enter support building list

configure.id: 点击建造发电厂，并进入建造模式
configure.value: Click to build power station and enter construction mode

configure.id: 点击退出建造模式
configure.value: Click to exit construction mode

configure.id: 点击建造间谍卫星，并进入建造模式
configure.value: Click to build spy satellite and enter construction mode

configure.id: 点击正在升级的建筑物
configure.value: Click the upgrading building

configure.id: 点击建造超时空传送仪，并进入建造模式
configure.value: Click to build Chronosphere and enter construction mode

configure.id: 点击进入超时空传送仪，配置特种兵
configure.value: Click to enter Chronosphere to dispatch special unit

configure.id: 拖动对应的特种兵，完成配置
configure.value: Pull the corresponding unit to complete the dispatch

configure.id: 完成建筑队列的购买，您现在可以免费同时建造或升级两个建筑
configure.value: Finish purchasing the builder team, now you can build or upgrade 2 buildings at the same time

configure.id: 点击按钮，购买建筑队列
configure.value: Click button to buy builder team

configure.id: 升级兵工厂，可以开放新兵种，提升兵种等级上限
configure.value: Upgrade the Armory to unlock new types of army and higher Maxed army level

configure.id: 点击建造战术研究院，并进入建造模式
configure.value: Click to build Tactics Academy and enter construction mode.

configure.id: 点击建造飞机场，并进入建造模式
configure.value: Click to build Airfield and enter construction mode.

configure.id: 点击超时空传送仪
configure.value: Click the Chronosphere

configure.id: 点击对应的集结点，可以进行兵种的升级
configure.value: Click the corresponding Rally Point to upgrade army

configure.id: 点击返回抽卡界面
configure.value: Click to return card interface

configure.id: 点击建造战车工厂，并进入建造模式
configure.value: Click to build War Factory and enter construction mode

configure.id: 拖放选择飞机要攻击的目标
configure.value: Pull to choose target for Aircraft

configure.id: 系统即将为您匹配到了一个对手，如果您确定要开始战斗，我们会从您的金库扣除
configure.value: System find a match for you, if you decide to start battle, gold will be cut from your Treasury

configure.id: 矿石精炼厂已经产出了一部份金币，可以做为您的启动资金
configure.value: Mineral Refinery extracted some gold, can be used as start-up capital

configure.id: 点击飞机场
configure.value: Click the Airfield

configure.id: 点击进入活动面板
configure.value: Click to enter Event Panel

configure.id: 点击领取首日奖励
configure.value: Click to collect 1st-day bonus

configure.id: 司令部升级
configure.value: Headquarters Upgrade

configure.id: 兵种升级通知内容
configure.value: Commander, your troop has finish upgrade, dispatch them now!

configure.id: 兵种升级通知标题
configure.value: Army upgrade finished

configure.id: 建筑升级通知标题
configure.value: Building upgrade finished

configure.id: 建筑升级通知内容
configure.value: Commander, your building has finished upgrading, go and check!

configure.id: 升级建筑需要消耗石油、钢铁、稀矿
configure.value: Need petroleum, steel and Lean ore to upgrade buildings

configure.id: 火箭车射程远、攻击高，适合与灰熊或者天启合作，在后方做为火力增援出战。
configure.value: Rocket Sled is of long range, high attack, better cooperate with Bear Tank or Apocalypse as backward damage dealer.

configure.id: 攻打作战图的敌人，可以占领他们的区域，占领后可以为主基地提供更多的资源。
configure.value: Attack enemies on battle map. Their area can provide you more resources after your occupation.

configure.id: 核弹可以摧毁半个基地。
configure.value: Nuclear bomb can destroy half of a base

configure.id: 伞兵可以用来深入主基地中心。
configure.value: Paratrooper can get into the heart of enemy base.

configure.id: 升级间谍卫星可以在作战图探索更广的范围。
configure.value: Upgrade spy satellite allow you to explore more areas on the battle map.

configure.id: 天启坦克是机枪塔的克星
configure.value: Apocalypse is the buster of Machine Gun Tower

configure.id: 光棱坦克有折射伤害，适合攻击建筑密集的基地。
configure.value: Damage of Prism Tank can be reflected to other enemies around. Good to attack enemy building groups.

configure.id: 电磁坦克可以让对方无法攻击。
configure.value: Magnetron Tank can stun enemies

configure.id: 升级兵种、战斗机、科技需要消耗大量的金币。
configure.value: It takes large amount of gold to upgrade army, aircraft and tech.

configure.id: 想提升战斗力，可以升级兵种等级、战斗机等级、科技等级。
configure.value: You can upgrade your battle units or tech to enhance your strength.

configure.id: 每攻下一个关卡，可以获得一个宝箱。
configure.value: You can get a chest for every stage passed.

configure.id: 尽可能多的占领资源岛，可以为您提供更多的资源。
configure.value: Occupy Resources Island as many as you can to obtain more resources.

configure.id: 步兵战车数量多时，战斗力是很可怕的。
configure.value: A group of IFV is fearful

configure.id: 灰熊坦克属于经济适用型兵种。
configure.value: Bear Tank is Affordable attritor army

configure.id: 狙击塔要小心步兵战车，面对大量的步兵战车将很难阻挡他们前进。
configure.value: The Sniper Tower need to be careful of IFV, it can not prevent a group of IFV.

configure.id: 摧毁其他建筑，主基地的生命值也会下降。
configure.value: Destroy other buildings can also lower the HP of home base.

configure.id: 出战前请记得配置技能卡。
configure.value: Please remember to equip skill card before battle

configure.id: 巨炮可以短时间内让天启坦克有来无回。
configure.value: Grand Cannon can eliminate Apocalypse Tank in a short time.

configure.id: 机枪塔是步兵战车的克星。
configure.value: Machine Gun Tower is the buster of IFV

configure.id: 遇到多管火箭炮时，只要靠近他就好了，越近越好。
configure.value: If you meet Multiple Rockets, just get close to them, the closer the better.

configure.id: 小心地雷！
configure.value: Mind the mine!

configure.id: 完美使用战斗机及技能卡，可以减少兵种的损失。
configure.value: Make good use of aircraft and skill card to reduce your battle cost.

configure.id: 掠夺玩家是获得资源最快的方式。
configure.value: Plunder other players is the quickest way to get resources.

configure.id: 攻打据点可以获得宝箱钥匙。
configure.value: Attack spot to get key of chest.

configure.id: 请及时升级仓库，否则可能会爆仓，多余的资源会消失。
configure.value: Please upgrade your warehouse, or you can not obtain the redundant resources.

configure.id: 攻下副本内所有的关卡可以获得神秘宝箱。
configure.value: Clear of all maps of a stage to get a mysterious chest.

configure.id: 一键补兵会根据上次配兵的状态，自动补满兵种。
configure.value: Fast recruit will dispatch armies automatically according to your last army status.

configure.id: 长按建筑不放会进入建造状态，这时候您可以随意移动摆放建筑。
configure.value: Long press on building will not enter the construction mode, this way you can move your building to another place.

configure.id: 经济建筑按钮
configure.value: Economical building button

configure.id: 指挥官，现在可以施放飞机帮助我们战斗了。
configure.value: Commander, now the aircraft can help in the battle.

configure.id: 点击按钮，立即完成配兵
configure.value: Click button to dispatch immediately.

configure.id: 点击领取金币。
configure.value: Click to collect gold.

configure.id: 点击选中所要施放的飞机
configure.value: 点击选中所要施放的飞机

configure.id: 点击选中区域施放飞机协助战斗
configure.value: 点击选中区域施放飞机协助战斗

configure.id: 点击选中所要施放的技能
configure.value: 点击选中所要施放的技能

configure.id: 点击选中区域施放飞机协助战斗
configure.value: 点击选中区域施放飞机协助战斗
